name: sys::thread_local::native::lazy::Storage::<T, D>::get_or_init

core::ptr::mut_ptr::<impl *mut T>::cast.doc: Casts to a pointer of another type.

sys::thread_local::native::lazy::Storage.doc:
# Safety
 The `self` reference must remain valid until the TLS destructor is run.

doc:
Gets a pointer to the TLS value, potentially initializing it with the
 provided parameters. If the TLS variable has been destroyed, a null
 pointer is returned.

 The resulting pointer may not be used after reentrant inialialization
 or thread destruction has occurred.

 # Safety
 The `self` reference must remain valid until the TLS destructor is run.
